name: Hellskull
flavorText: "One final blow severed the great demon's head, sending it rolling before Dregan's feet. He contemplated the foul thing for a moment, then took it with him to adorn his shield." —The Chronicles of Crusader Dregan
flavorTextHtml: "One final blow severed the great demon's head, sending it rolling before Dregan's feet. He contemplated the foul thing for a moment, then took it with him to adorn his shield." —The Chronicles of Crusader Dregan

secondary.textHtml: Gain 10% increased damage while wielding a two-handed weapon. (Crusader Only)
secondary.text: Gain 10% increased damage while wielding a two-handed weapon. (Crusader Only)
